messages.message:
(context: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-4390) BTW a question connected to the one about exposing secret keys.
We plan to expose custom variables. I believe while it's not as sensitive as exposing secrets (we can be sure that downstream & API users has some level of access), it's still a good idea to document this. So ideally we can add note in documentation/on UI to establish agreement of what we can and can't send downstream.

WDYT?
If it's a good idea, I believe this is the good place for note in documentation:
https://docs.instabase.com/apps/custom-functions#adding-custom-and-secret-keys-in-custom-functions
and on UI we can do it on project editor view

Posting there, so support discussion will be more focused
